title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - All Power, No Pain: Scale Agentic AI Apps in an Open Lakehouse (AIM247)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全功能，零痛点：在开放湖仓中扩展智能体AI应用 (AIM247)
abstract: Harness the power of Agentic AI without the data headaches. In this session, you’ll get a practical blueprint for building trusted, scalable AI applications using Apache Iceberg-based open lakehouse architectures. Learn how to fuel your lakehouse with real-time data, ensure data quality for accuracy, and provide a solid data foundation for your AI agents. See how to design systems where agents can seamlessly access data, leverage vector and relational data for enhanced reasoning, and execute complex workflows without bottlenecks. You’ll walk away ready to confidently deploy and scale data for your own agentic AI applications. This presentation is brought to you by Qlik, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 利用代理AI的强大功能，无需担心数据难题。在本次会议中，您将获得使用基于Apache Iceberg的开放湖仓架构构建可信、可扩展AI应用程序的实用蓝图。了解如何使用实时数据为您的湖仓提供动力，确保数据质量以提高准确性，并为您的AI代理提供坚实的数据基础。了解如何设计系统，使代理能够无缝访问数据，利用向量和关系数据增强推理能力，并执行复杂的工作流程而不会出现瓶颈。您将准备好自信地部署和扩展自己的代理AI应用程序的数据。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Qlik为您呈现。
